en.email-exists-message: It looks like there's already an account using that email. Please login or use a different email to continue.
en.succes-message: Thanks for using our service. We'll send you an email to confirm the event.
en.succes-message-2: Would you like to receive notifications when you get a new offer?
en.no-djs-message: Sorry, we don't have any DJs available.

step-1.header: Check if we have DJs available
step-1.event-location-description: Venue name or city where the event is happening.

step-2.header: Great, we have DJs available. We need a bit of information to make offers.
step-2.event-rider-description: Do you need speakers and lights for the event?
step-2.event-genres-description: Choose what kind of music do you need, or let us choose suitable music genres based on your other selections and event description.

step-3.header: Thanks! Please tell us a bit more.
step-3.guests-description: ${ prefix } ${ amount } people attending the event.
step-3.event-description-description:
What is the budget? 
What is the age of the guests? 
What kind of venue is it? 
Do you have any special requirements?

step-4.header: Great! We're finding DJs now. How can we get back to you?
step-4.contact-phone-description: Your phone number is only shared with qualified DJs.
step-4.contact-email-description: Your email is only shared with qualified DJs.

da.succes-message: Tak for at du bruger vores service. Vi sender dig en mail til at bekræfte eventet.
da.succes-message-2: Vil du modtage besked når du får et nyt tilbud?
da.no-djs-message: Desværre, vi har ingen ledige DJs.

step-1.header: Se om vi har ledige DJs
step-1.event-location-description: Navnet på stedet eller byen hvor begivenheden afholdes.

step-2.header: Vi har ledige DJs! For at give tilbud har vi brug for lidt mere information.
step-2.event-rider-description: Har du brug for højtalere og lys til begivenheden?
step-2.event-genres-description: Vælg hvilkent slags musik ønsker du, eller Lad os vælge passende musikgenrer baseret på dine andre valg og event beskrivelse.

step-3.event-description-description:
Hvor stort er budgettet? 
Hvad er alderen på gæsterne? 
Hvilken slags lokation er det? 
Har du nogle specielle krav?

step-4.header: Vi finder DJs nu. Hvordan kan vi kontakte dig?
step-4.contact-phone-description: Dit telefonnummer bliver kun delt med kvalificerede DJs.
step-4.contact-email-description: Din email bliver kun delt med kvalificerede DJs.
